title: Composition in Black
provenance_text:
Rafael Gomez Canogar [b. 1935], Madrid, Spain [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 75, illustrated in catalogue, plate 65) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on December 17, 1958.
